name: SK Global Software
description:
Founded in 1995 with a global re-branding in 2015, SK Global Software is a software development company known for bringing valuable enhancement to the Microsoft Dynamics channel, with our primary focus on banking, treasury and revenue automation. Our customers and partners are our highest priority, and it is our mission to deliver unparalleled software and support services.
We work hard to build and maintain high-quality software and respected, long-term relationships with the Dynamics user and reseller communities.
READ MORE...
